item.title: A New Term for Myanmar
item.description: If you have been following our work for a while, you will know that at Wind&Bones, we have long-standing connections with Myanmar. In 2017, Wind&Bones’s Will Buckingham was on the founding faculty at the Parami Institute, which is now Parami University. Then between 2018 and 2019, Will was back in Myanmar to work on a writing residency with his Wind&Bones collaborator and co-director, Hannah Stevens, delivering workshops on writing, ethics and social change.
